messages.subject: Changing parenting patterns
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/27/02 1:38:40 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/27/02 1:38:40 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
She spent her whole life advocating for children, her own and all children,
and she was living proof that it is possible to overcome one's own
childhood conditioning and change the way generations of a family live and
will live together. >>

What a beautiful legacy she has left behind.
I am so sorry for your loss...it is very painful to be motherless in this
world for those that have a close relationship with their Moms.

Ren
